sourcesContent:
<template>
  <nav>
    <router-link to="/">Home</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/about" v-if="user"> About |</router-link>
    <router-link  to="/login" v-if="!user"> Login |</router-link>
    <router-link to="/signout" v-if="user"> Signout |</router-link>
  </nav>
  <router-view/>
</template>


<script>
  export default {
    created() {
      const res = localStorage.getItem('session');
       if(res){
         this.$store.commit('setInit',JSON.parse(res));
       }
    },
    computed : {
      user(){
        return this.$store.getters.userdata
      }
    }
  }
</script>


<style>


@font-face {
  font-family: MyMontSerrat;
  src: url("../public/fonts/Montserrat/Montserrat-Regular.ttf");
}

#app {
  font-family:  MyMontSerrat,Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #1A1A1C;
}

nav {
  padding: 30px;
}

nav a {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #1A1A1C;
}

nav a.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
